review: Seems OK, time will tell.  I was perplexed that as I browsed movies etc., some said "Watch Now", others said, "Add to watch List". I wondered why I couldn't watch some "Now".  I think it's because they are not free, i.e., if I want to watch now, I need to pay.  Hmmm.  Gotta love Amazon, they really know how to separate you from your $ painlessly. Great company to have stock in. If you don't have any, I recommend you buy some.

review: I like the interface fine. I do not like the shows were one or two episodes are free then you get to the next one and you have to pay to watch. To bad - I really do like the fire TV stick.
